item.title: House GOP Leaders Purged Conservatives Using Secret Criteria List
item.description: House GOP Leaders Purged Conservatives Using Secret Criteria List http://t.co/bgzNXcx1 via @BreitbartNews
item.content:encoded: House GOP Leaders Purged Conservatives Using Secret Criteria List http://t.co/bgzNXcx1 via @BreitbartNews House Republican leaders used a secret criteria list to decide which conservatives to purge from powerful House committees, Breitbart News has learned. As this time, it appears they will keep the criteria list hidden from the public, too. Spokespeople for members of House GOP leadership have refused to discuss details about the list on the record with press. Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: breitbart.com

item.title: This Hilarious Video Shows Everything That's Annoying About Instagram
item.description: This Hilarious Video Shows Everything That's Annoying About Instagram http://t.co/VoRmioa9
item.content:encoded: This Hilarious Video Shows Everything That's Annoying About Instagram http://t.co/VoRmioa9 Because we're all egomaniacs who like to moonlight as artistic geniuses and because damn near everybody uses Instagram, the filtered photo sharing social network has devolved into a thumb scrolling exercise of the same freaking pictures: clouds, city skylines, feet, coffee art, food, walls, babies, sneaky boobs and anything to turn a like. This CollegeHumor parody video (to the tune of Nickelback, double parody ha!) hilariously makes fun of all things annoying with Instagram. I find myself nodding my head to everything (and checking Instagram again and again and again) [CollegeHumor] Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: gizmodo.com

item.title: Mars Rover Finding Revealed By Space Agency
item.description: Organics On Mars: Curiosity Rover Finds Evidence Of Organic Compounds On Red Planet (LIVE… http://t.co/bHBGkdrL
item.content:encoded: Organics On Mars: Curiosity Rover Finds Evidence Of Organic Compounds On Red Planet (LIVE… http://t.co/bHBGkdrL A team of scientists announced on Monday that the Mars Rover Curiosity had found evidence of organic compounds on the Red Planet. Martian soil samples analyzed aboard the rover revealed "water and sulfur and chlorine-containing substances," the space agency said in press materials. Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: huffingtonpost.com

item.title: Bob Costas, NFL Surrounded by Armed Security
item.description: Bob Costas, NFL Surrounded by Armed Security http://t.co/xdcNKS8u via @BreitbartNews
item.content:encoded: Bob Costas, NFL Surrounded by Armed Security http://t.co/xdcNKS8u via @BreitbartNews Bob Costas' gun control rant was bad but made worse by one key point -- he lives much of his life with the benefit of armed security. Link - Trackbacks
